resources.string: Open this service to enable three key earphone\nchange music by press up or down key.\nAdvanced Functions need also give the root permission!
This application will enble three key earphone change music by press up or down key.
Please Set These Before You Use!
Click the button on your earphone which means volume UP
Click the button on your earphone which means volume DOWN
You may click a wrong button.\nCurrent Key:
You must root your device before you use it!
1.When you close the screen, the physical key which control volume will change music instead.\n\n2.We will not change any files in System after being given ROOT Permission.
Change Volume Button on EarPhone By Custom
Only Change When You Long Pressed Physical Button
Custom Event Work When Long Press\n(Short Press Will Still Change Music)
Attention:The Long Press Button Function Can Not Use When You Close Screen!
Please insert your earphone before setting!
Please set earphone device before use!
